summary: A meteor lands in Jamestown California in 1849 during the gold rush. It is found by miners who accidentally release it's spores which turn the population into bloodthirsty mutants.
cast: David A. Lockhart|Camille Montgomery|Rick Mora|Robert Amstler|George Anderson|Jeffery Babineau|Timothy Bartgis|Carol S. Bayers|Harry Bruce|Douglas Carranza|Hilary Castaneda|Randall Marshall Dillon|Meghan D. Hall|Autumn Harrison|Colin Hussey|Fred Jardin|Kevin Karvonen|Lauren C. Kelly|Sharon Larkin|Pete L. Lawson|Benjamin Loverin|Pat McIntire|Sean McIntire|Kevin Miller|Heather Montanez|G.J. Morrison|Kelsey Noot|Sandra Palhegyi|Steve Palhegyi|Mandy Pauline|Elle Runyan|Pete Sprouse|James Edward Tolbert|Frank Verbeck|John Wise|Nathan J. Yeisley
title: The Dead and the Damned
